verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H5921"\w* end, \w In|strong="H5921"\w* verses, understanding \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w men|strong="H0559"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Ziph \w had|strong="H0430"\w* come \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Saul|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* David hidden \w with|strong="H0430"\w* \w us|strong="H0559"\w*?

Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thy name, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* judge \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy strength.
O \w God|strong="H0369"\w*, hear \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer: give ear \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* words \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* strangers \w have|strong="H3045"\w* risen \w up|strong="H0398"\w* against \w me|strong="H7121"\w*; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* sought after \w my|strong="H3045"\w* soul: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* set \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* eyes.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w behold|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* helper: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* protector \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* soul.

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* evils upon \w my|strong="H5414"\w* enemies; \w and|strong="H3478"\w* cut \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy truth.
I will freely sacrifice to thee, and will give praise, O God, to thy name: because it is good:
For thou hast delivered me out of all trouble: and my eye hath looked down upon my enemies.
